Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cultural Revolution[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]The Empire gains bonus % for [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Musician points equal to its [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production output.
